title: About
text: This Comic Book is a scientific outreach product designed by the Editors during the TUM Researcher Program. TUM Researcher is a 12-month qualification programme from the Technical University of Munich that prepares researchers for a responsible leadership role in research.

title: Contributing
text:
You can contribute by translating this comic book to your native language.
If you are interested, get in touch with Dr. Anna Biller: anna.biller@tum.de

title: Lumi’s Delight - A Comic Book
text:
Lumi’s Delight - a scientific Comic Book for young readers aged 6-10 years and all adults young at heart!
Written and illustrated by Coline Weinz.
Edited by Dr. Anna M Biller, Dr. Alejandra Parreño, Dr. Simone Stegbauer, Dr. Verena Streibel, and Dr. Matthew The.

title: About
text:
Funding
The Comic Book was funded by The Daylight Academy, eConversion, and crc325.
